author: Indiesoft LLC
description: Rotated Grid Super-Sampling (RGSS) for the Defold engine.
name: Sharp Sprite

releases.message:
## What's Changed
* Updated all shaders to GLSL version 1.4.0
* Updated the example project for Defold 1.10.1

## What's Changed
* Updated the demo for a better demonstration of RGSS
* Updated Spine materials and add Spine example
* Updated docs and cover

## What's Changed
* Fix for build error in Defold 1.9.4 by @britzl in https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-sharp-sprite/pull/3

What's changed:
- If the target device lacks derivates functions, then shaders and your game will still work, but with less beautiful graphics.
